title: The Modern electric refrigerator. Part 1. The How and why of refrigeration
creator_credit: David Cons, Frank A. Hoare, Film Producers Guild and Merton Park
brief_description: Describes the nature of food and explains how heat acts to cause decay and cold acts as a preservative. Explains three main processes of refrigeration - evaporation, pressure and condensation, and how these function in a sealed unit. Shows how to pack food for maximum efficiency and air circulation. Gives advice on defrosting, cleaning and care.
